training_captions: Compact FPC helical antenna mounted above a small circular reflector dish; produces circular polarization with a broadside main lobe, ultra-narrow fractional bandwidth and mid realized gain, usable across UHF/L bands via scaling.
Flexible printed-circuit helix wound on a slim former and backed by a round reflector; single-feed CP radiation with a broadside beam, exhibiting ultra-narrowband behavior and moderate gain.

Reflector-backed FPC helix: several uniform turns starting from a base feed near the dish, delivering circular polarization and a broadside pattern; designed for ultra-narrow FBW with mid gain in UHF/L.
